catalog_info.title: Advanced Persian I
catalog_info.notes: Instructor: Sheida Dayani. Formerly Persian 131r and Persian 132r.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Persian BA/BB sequence, or equivalent, or permission of the instructor.
catalog_info.description: Review of advanced Persian grammar and syntax with introduction to both pre-modern and modern Persian prose and poetry. Themes cover a wide range of disciplines, from literature, history, social sciences and the arts.
